description: Enterprise techniques used by cmd, ATT&CK software S0106 v1.0
name: cmd (S0106)

techniques.comment: cmd is used to execute programs and other actions at the command-line interface.
cmd can be used to find files and directories with native functionality such as dir commands.
cmd can be used to delete files from the file system.
cmd can be used to copy files to a remotely connected system.
cmd can be used to find information about the operating system.
